commandDescription: Compress XML Metadata Files for best conflict handling with SVC systems. Works with relative or absolute paths.
allFlagDescription: Compress all XML files with support compression in your project.
directoryFlagDescription: Compress XML Files from specific directory. This options does not take effect if you choose compress all.
fileFlagDescription: Compress the specified XML file. This options does not take effect if you choose compress directory or all.
missingCompressTargetError: You must select compress all, entire directory(s) or single file(s)
fileNotCompressed: File %s does not support XML compression. '( %d%)'
